alert.note: Alert for Baker; Berrien; Calhoun; Clay; Colquitt; Cook; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell; Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 11 at 6:56PM EDT until August 11 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 626 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA DALE HENRY HOUSTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN COLQUITT COOK TIFT WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN CLAY DOUGHERTY EARLY MILLER MITCHELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ARLINGTON, ASBURY, BABCOCK, BAGBY STATE PARK, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BEAMON, BELLVIEW, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNS CROSSROADS, CAMILLA, CENTERVILLE, CHULA, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOK CO A/P, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTLE, COTTON, COTTONWOOD, CUBA, DALEVILLE, DAYS CROSSROADS, DICKEY, DILL, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ENTERPRISE, EWELL, FORT GAINES, FORT RUCKER, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GREGGS, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HOGGARD MILL, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, JONES CROSSING, LACONTE, LAWRENCEVILLE, LOCKETT CROSSING, MABSON, MASSEE, MAYHAW, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MOORES CROSSROADS, MORGAN, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NASHVILLE, NEWTON, OZARK, PECAN, PELHAM, PINE VALLEY, PRETORIA, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICKS PLACE, SCREAMER, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TIFTON, TURNER CITY, WALKER, WEBER, AND WILLIAMSBURG.
